Hi Liza. Do your UX/UI designers work on an hourly basis? Your rates in Euros seem to indicate a fixed fee per month.

Yelyzaveta Saenko sent the following message at 5:43 PM
View Yelyzaveta’s profileYelyzaveta Saenko
Yelyzaveta Saenko  5:43 PM
Hi Andrei,

We have a 40 hour per month package available if you are interested. Let's set up a quick call and discuss all the details. What do you think?

Andrei Arkhanguelski sent the following message at 5:44 PM
View Andrei’s profileAndrei Arkhanguelski
Andrei Arkhanguelski  5:44 PM
We don't need a fixed number of hours per month, since we might not need 40 hours of work every month. We prefer to pay per hour.

Yelyzaveta Saenko sent the following message at 6:32 PM
View Yelyzaveta’s profileYelyzaveta Saenko
Yelyzaveta Saenko  6:32 PM

I suggest discussing all the details in an online meeting. Could you please let me know a convenient day and time for you, as well as your email, so I can send over an invitation? Looking forward to our conversation!

name: Martin Dagenais
note:
Martin Dagenais is interested in a amazon specialist.

Result:
Company Name: NuTone-Densi
Company Website: https://www.nutone-densi.com/
Contact Person: Martin Dagenais
Product:  Densi increases business productivity by supporting the seamless operation of print and copier infrastructure - delivering a full range of high quality consumable imaging supplies, including Toner, Cartridges, Ink and Parts for large copier/high volume network printers.  
In addition to always delivering the best products on the market, the responsiveness of the Densi team makes the buying process simple and fast for over 2000 active reseller customers globally.
In operation since 1979, Densi’s primary operations & distribution center is located at our headquarters in Montreal, Canada, with distribution points throughout North America.
Country-Location: Canada
Target Audience: North America
Immediate Requirement: He was interested in French speaking people, Amazon specialist, Social Media, Designer, Magento Developer, Power BI microsoft
Next Step: Send presentation, website, example of contract. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email. Next call will be with Martin and his Project Manager.

SM: Anna V.

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Hello Asaf and Yaron,

I hope this message finds you in good spirits. At Remote Helpers, we're excited to share some fantastic updates with you.

Our team has recently been reinforced with skilled professionals across all departments. To mark this occasion, we're offering an exclusive promotion: a 15% discount on full-time hires until December 15th. This offer spans every department, ensuring that your specific needs are covered.

Get to know our new team members and explore their expertise https://rhelpers.com/.

Eager to discuss how our enhanced team can contribute to your upcoming projects. Let's arrange a call at your earliest convenience.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Anton

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Dear Asaf and Yaron,

I hope both of you are well. I'm Andrii from Remote Helpers, reaching out for the first time since you've previously benefited from our lead generation services. Our commitment to enhancing our clients' success drives us to continuously improve and expand our capabilities.

We've made significant updates to our service offerings, which are now featured on our new website https://www.rh-s.com/. Our enhanced team of lead generation specialists is ready to deliver even more value to your projects.

I'm keen to discuss how we can further support your business goals with our updated lead generation solutions. Are there current or upcoming initiatives where you see potential for collaboration?

Looking forward to the possibility of continuing our successful partnership.

Best regards, Andrii

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
We interviewed candidate for Collect Group company (our ex - client).


Candidate :


Personal Assistant :


Irina  https://rh-s.com/app/managers/personal-assistant/irina-ki


Responsibilities : 


- Organize and coordinate travel arrangements for business trips, conferences, and events.

- Manage and maintain the executive's meeting schedule, ensuring seamless coordination.

- Handle all aspects of travel planning, including booking flights, accommodations, and transportation.

-Provide comprehensive administrative support, including document preparation, correspondence, and record-keeping.



SM Andrii

SA Sona

type.name: Follow Up
type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
We interviewed candidate for Collect Group company.


Candidate:


Personal Assistant :


Valeriia https://rh-s.com/app/managers/personal-assistant/valeria-b


Responsibilities : 


- Organize and coordinate travel arrangements for business trips, conferences, and events.

- Manage and maintain the executive's meeting schedule, ensuring seamless coordination.

- Handle all aspects of travel planning, including booking flights, accommodations, and transportation.

-Provide comprehensive administrative support, including document preparation, correspondence, and record-keeping.


Asaf expressed doubts about Valeria’s suitability for the position, noting the importance of an assistant who is familiar with social media and trends, especially for handling travel and local arrangements independently.


We will keep Asaf updated on other candidates with similar but potentially more aligned profiles.


SM Sona

SA Inna

type.description: Повторное обращение к клиенту или лиду для продолжения взаимодействия.

client_communications.note:
Black Friday offer!

You can purchase hours at a 25% discount and allocate them across multiple specialists.

40 hours for €650 (normally €850)
80 hours for €1050 (normally €1400)
160 hours for €1800 (normally €2400)

Divide the purchased hours between different roles: use 20 hours for a designer and 20 hours for a developer, ensuring you get the exact expertise you need, when you need it.

This offer is only valid until 06.12.2024. Take advantage of this opportunity today: https://rh-s.com/sale.

Best regards,

Sona
